string.name: moves
string.comment: moves in this context means your "total moves" you made in your previous puzzle storm attempt. It is displayed after completing one puzzle storm together with your other stats

string.name: accuracy
string.comment: accuracy is displayed after completing one puzzle rush together with your other stats

string.name: combo
string.comment: combo in this case means your "best combo" after completing a run of puzzle storm.

string.name: time
string.comment: time in this context means the total time that has passed in your previous run. The string is displayed after completing one puzzle rush

string.name: endRun
string.comment:
endRun
If you want to end the run prematurely, you press enter
